section.title: How to get involved
section.para: Helping us is very easy. We provide a list of open tasks we want to get solved. Before you jump on our wiki page, consider doing the following things before getting started:

listitem.para: Create a local working copy of gimp-help-2 for yourself.
Check our wiki page, which tells you in more detail how you can start:

section.title: Spelling Errors
section.para:
If you see a small spelling or grammar mistake, please send us an email with the following information:
a URL pointing to the page with the mistake,
a few lines of text around or near the mistake,
and please recommend a correction.
Send your mail to: romanofski@gimp.org Thanks!

section.title: Quickstart - Open Tasks
section.para: We provide a list of open task where we're looking for volunteers. The list is updated frequently and available from on our Wiki Page.
